Method.name: UniqueFilename
Method.Description: Returns a unique filename based on the name passed in, by appending a sequence number if the file already exists.

Method.name: Append
Method.Description: Appends one or more path components to an existing path. Uses the implementation in class %File for platform indepndence, but allows more then one path component to be appended at once.
Method.Implementation: Set Result = Path For i = 1:1:$Get(SubPaths) { Set SubPath = $Get(SubPaths(i)) If SubPath = "" Continue Set Result = ##class(%File).SubDirectoryName(Result, SubPath) } Quit Result
